div.p: A unique identifier to name the element.

An identifier that must be unique within the current document and is used to name the element so that it can be referred to, or referenced from, somewhere else in the record. This facilitates building links between the element and other resources within the current document.
Use target, conventionDeclarationReference, localTypeDeclarationReference, maintenanceEventReference, or sourceReference to link to an id attribute within the EAS instance.

div.egXML: <occupations> <occupation> <term> Assistant examiner - level III </term> <placeName target="#place1"> Bern </placeName> </occupation> </occupations> <places> <place id="place1"> <placeName> Bern </placeName> <placeRole> Place of work </placeRole> </place> </places>
